titles.title: Honoring the 125th anniversary of Mississippi University for Women.
Honoring the 125th anniversary of Mississippi University for Women.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce
committee.subcommittee: Higher Education and Workforce Development Subcomittee

bill.summary: Congratulates Mississippi University for Women, a four-year coeducational public university in Columbus, Mississippi, for its contributions and graduates.
